briefTitle: Analyses of Exosomes in the Cerebrospinal Fluid for Breast Cancer Patients With Suspicion of Leptomeningeal Metastasis.
officialTitle: Benefit of Analyzing Exosomes in the Cerebrospinal Fluid During the Medical Care of Breast Cancer Patients With Suspicion of Leptomeningeal Metastasis.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proteomic profiles issued from cerebrospinal fluid at diagnosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient with histologically proven breast cancer
* Patient with suspected metastatic leptomeningitis
* Age ≥ 18 years
* Patient covered by the French social security regime
* Signed written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of cancer other than the one being treated
* Contraindication to carrying out the lumbar puncture or cerebrospinal MRI
* Pregnant or breastfeeding patient
